name: Pofubox
description:
In Turkish, "Pofuduk" means a thing which is furry and soft.

Being a Pofuduk therefore means grooving about seamlessly through the maze of life. For this reason, "Pof" has become a way of designating a zen-like approach to life which includes chilling out, cooling it, loosening up, mellowing down, relaxing. 

In a very contemporary way, to pof also means not giving a pof about whatever doesn't pof.
